function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of self-reported health ratings as opposed to objective health measures","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of participant health status and potential confounding in the study findings","Mitigation":"Include objective health measures alongside self-reported health ratings for a more comprehensive understanding","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices, biometric sensors","People":"Study participants","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Comparison of respondents from high-risk areas with other regions without accounting for confounding variables","Impact":"Potential bias in the comparison and inaccurate assessment of differences between the two groups","Mitigation":"Account for confounding variables such as age, gender, socioeconomic status, and comorbidities in the comparison analysis","Technologies":"Statistical software for multivariate analysis","People":"Research analysts","Owner":"Data analysis team"},{"Description":"Use of self-reported knowledge and perceptions without objective validation","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate assessment of knowledge and perceptions, leading to biased study findings","Mitigation":"Include objective knowledge and perception assessments alongside self-reported measures for a more comprehensive understanding","Technologies":"Survey validation tools, knowledge tests, perception assessments","People":"Study participants","Owner":"Research team"}]}
